This is absolutely the worst game that I have ever played. It will randomly be filled with cheaters who are hitting pro level god tier shots in the lowest ranks, smurfs who talk like they are good and end up at  the bottom of the leaderboard, and you cannot forget those who join comp. games with no mic at all. With all that being said, this is one of the games that I keep coming back to every single day. Why? I wish I fucking knew myself. There is just something about joining a game with people who are crying about losing the very first round and then putting a .50 round through my teammates head and screaming “One Deague” through the mic at max volume. Yes, this is what I do. No, I do not feel bad about killing people who take the game to seriously when we are down by 13. If I am being at all serious about this game for those who want to know if it is worth their time, I would say it depends. CSGO is one of those games that is easy to learn, but hard to master. There are countless spray patterns for each gun that is used, you must learn the map’s callouts, and communication is key with your team. This can be said about probably any shooter that is in existence. The skins are cheap for some good ones and stupid expensive for others. The cases are a bad idea, as I have spent so much money in hopes of getting a knife or other highly rated item. Unfortunately, it is very unlikely that you will get one cheaper than just outright buying the skin. Gameplay is fun and when you get a team that knows what they are doing, comp. games can go by like a breeze or have you clenching your teeth like a close Super Bowl game. All in all, this game is a must play for those who have never played it and is filled with hundreds or hours of rage inducing fun. The only game that I go from mad to laughing my ass off at 4 a.m. with some friends about how I got a nade kill across the map.
